HyperSegmentation

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1650974719048{margin-top: 5px !important;}»]Identify customer groups with similar behaviors and increase your sales with segment-level personalization.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=»small» button_style=»regular» button_color_2=»Extra-Color-1″ icon_family=»none» url=»/segmentacion» text=»More Info» margin_top=»15″ margin_bottom=»10″][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

Fraud Detection

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1650975226553{margin-top: 5px !important;}»]Minimize fraud losses by identifying customer/transaction patterns..[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=»small» button_style=»regular» button_color_2=»Extra-Color-1″ icon_family=»none» url=»/deteccion-de-fraude» text=»More Info» margin_top=»15″ margin_bottom=»10″][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

Credit Scoring

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1650975286744{margin-top: 5px !important;}»]Identify customer groups with similar behaviors and increase your sales with segment-level personalization. [/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=»small» button_style=»regular» button_color_2=»Extra-Color-1″ icon_family=»none» url=»/scoring-crediticio» text=»More Info» margin_top=»15″ margin_bottom=»10″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=»in_container» full_screen_row_position=»middle» column_margin=»default» scene_position=»center» text_color=»dark» text_align=»left» overlay_strength=»0.3″ shape_divider_position=»bottom» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Recommendation Engine

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1650975394728{margin-top: 5px !important;}»]Predict the next best deal for each of your customers by understanding their behavior and characteristics[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=»small» button_style=»regular» button_color_2=»Extra-Color-1″ icon_family=»none» url=»/motor-de-recomendacion» text=»More Info» margin_top=»15″ margin_bottom=»10″][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

LifeCycle Value

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1650975418406{margin-top: 5px !important;}»]We predicted the total revenue that each of the customers will generate and increase sales, retaining the most valuable[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=»small» button_style=»regular» button_color_2=»Extra-Color-1″ icon_family=»none» url=»/valor-del-ciclo-de-vida» text=»More Info» margin_top=»15″ margin_bottom=»10″][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Demand Prediction

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1650975440304{margin-top: 5px !important;}»]We predicted the future behavior of demand more accurately, to improve trading and operational strategies on stock.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=»small» button_style=»regular» button_color_2=»Extra-Color-1″ icon_family=»none» url=»/prediccion-de-la-demanda-2/» text=»More Info» margin_top=»15″ margin_bottom=»10″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=»in_container» full_screen_row_position=»middle» column_margin=»default» scene_position=»center» text_color=»dark» text_align=»left» overlay_strength=»0.3″ shape_divider_position=»bottom» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Price Optimization

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1650975464317{margin-top: 5px !important;}»]Maximize your company’s total revenue by predicting the right discount for each customer.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=»small» button_style=»regular» button_color_2=»Extra-Color-1″ icon_family=»none» url=»/optimizacion-de-precios» text=»More Info» margin_top=»15″ margin_bottom=»10″][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Abandonment Prediction

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1650975485025{margin-top: 5px !important;}»]Detect customers with high abandonment probabilities and trigger the retention plan in time.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=»small» button_style=»regular» button_color_2=»Extra-Color-1″ icon_family=»none» url=»/prediccion-de-abandono» text=»More Info» margin_top=»15″ margin_bottom=»10″][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1650975507269{margin-top: 5px !important;}»]Improve your logistics processes by applying mathematical optimizations at scale.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
